scripts.dev: pnpm -F babybox-panel-configer dev & pnpm -F babybox-panel dev & pnpm -F babybox-panel-backend dev
scripts.stop: pm2 delete configer && pm2 delete babybox
scripts.start:main: cd "../dist" && pnpm install --production && pm2 start ../dist/index.js -n babybox
scripts.build: pnpm install --production && pnpm -F babybox-panel build && pnpm -F babybox-panel-backend build && pnpm -F babybox-panel-configer build
